name: Chaos Resurgence
introduction:
◆ Rules ◆
● After completing The Last Vestiges of Towering Citadel: Memory Stage <unbreak>15</unbreak>, Memory of Chaos stages will be unlocked.
● Memory of Chaos stages and rewards are refreshed regularly. 

◆ Refresh Rules ◆
● Memory of Chaos and Pure Fiction are updated alternatively every two weeks, with updates occurring at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> on Mondays (server time).
● Each period of Memory of Chaos will be open for 6 weeks.
